okBtn.description: Appears as button in confirmation dialog

cancelBtn.description: Appears as button in confirmation dialog

optionsBtn.description: For a button in the popup page, when clicked opens the full settings page

resetConfirm.message: This will erase all whitelisted items, ad options and preferences. If you don't want to lose your settings, cancel and click "Download" first.

whitelistTabTitle.description: Appears as title for tab in options page

adsTabTitle.description: Appears as title for tab in options page

adsEnableBtn.description: Shown next to channels, short for 'Enable ads for this channel'

miscTabTitle.description: Appears as title for tab in options page, for all other items such as importing/exporting/support, etc.

channelColumn.description: Appears at the top of a table, indicating that each of the following columns represents a channel

advertiserColumn.description: Appears at the top of a table, indicating that each of the following columns represents an advertiser

videoColumn.description: Appears at top of a table, indicating that the following columns contains a link to a video

statusColumn.description: Appears at the top of a table, indicating that each of the following columns represents an action taken against an ad

actionColumn.description: Appears at the top of a table, indicating that each of the following columns contains actions to take against an advertiser

addBtn.description: Button shown next to channel name, for adding to whitelist

addedBtn.description: Shown next to channel search results that are already in whitelist

adsStillBlocked.message: Ads may still be blocked, make sure you've added the following rule to your uBlock Origin whitelist

removeExcludeTooltip.message: Re-allow channel to be whitelisted if subscribed

removeExcludeConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to allow "$channelName$" to be automatically whitelisted (if subscribed)?

removeWhitelistConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to remove "$channelName$" from whitelist?

bulkRemoveWhitelistConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to remove $count$ items from whitelist?

bulkRemoveExcludeConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to allow $count$ items to be automatically whitelisted (if subscribed)?

removeBlacklistConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to remove "$channelName$" from blacklist?

bulkRemoveBlacklistConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to remove $count$ items from blacklist?

removeUnmuteConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to resume muting for "$channelName$"?

bulkRemoveUnmuteConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to resume muting for $count$ items?

removeMuteConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to remove "$channelName$" from mutelist?

bulkRemoveMuteConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to remove $count$ items from mutelist?

adErrorsOptionTooltip.message: Skips to video if ad fails to play, rather than showing the 'An error occurred' with TV static

verifyWlOptionTooltip.message: Confirm that ads aren't blocked on whitelisted channels by simulating loading an ad

adBlocked.description: Shown next to ads that were blocked

adAllowed.description: Shown next to ads that were allowed through

muteAdvertiserTooltip.message: Automatically mute all ads from this advertiser

blacklistAdvertiserTooltip.message: Block all ads from this advertiser

pauseAfterAdTooltip.message: If a muted ad finishes playing, and the tab is not currently in focus, video is quietly paused in the background until user returns to it

permissionDesc.message: A one-time permission is needed to search for YouTube channels

searchDesc.message: Type to search for a youtube channel or
searchDesc.description: Next to this phrase will be a button labeled 'Import from Channels', which is why the 'or' is here

searchPlaceholder.description: Temporary placeholder text inside textbox where user will type a channel name to search for

importSubsFailed.message: Could not fetch subscriptions. Make sure you're logged in to YouTube.

importSubsConfirm.message: Found $total$ subscriptions, of which $new$ are not in the list. Add $new$ items to whitelist?

updateFailed.message: Could not set settings, encountered error: $error$

wrongFormat.message: File needs to be of type "$expected$", detected "$encountered$" instead

parseFailed.message: Failed to parse as JSON. File is likely not JSON or corrupted.

confirmImport.message: Add $whitelisted$ items to whitelist, $blacklisted$ items to blacklist, and $muted$ items to mutelist?
